task_name: Ensure Full Application Compatibility with Screen Readers for Visually Impaired Users
resource_notes: Requires deep expertise in WCAG 2.1 AA and manual testing with NVDA/VoiceOver. This is a cross-cutting concern affecting all UI components.
alternative_approach: Engage a third-party accessibility consultant for audit and remediation, increasing cost but ensuring compliance.
risk_factors: Underestimation of remediation effort for complex custom components. Team may lack sufficient expertise.
mitigation_strategy: Break down work by feature area. Prioritize core features first. Allocate budget for external consultation if needed.

task_name: Write formulas for a custom mode
resource_notes: Requires integrating a rich code editor and a mathematical parsing library (e.g., math.js) for real-time validation. High security sensitivity.
alternative_approach: Use a simpler textarea with debounced server-side validation, degrading user experience but reducing frontend complexity.
risk_factors: RISK-001 (Sandbox security). Parser library may have large bundle size. Syncing client-side validation with backend sandbox capabilities.
mitigation_strategy: Choose a well-vetted parsing library. Rigorous security code reviews. Share function allow-list between frontend and backend via a shared module.

task_name: Automatically sync offline data upon reconnection
resource_notes: Complex state management and handling of network edge cases. Requires robust testing strategy using network interception.
alternative_approach: Limit offline functionality to only read-only data, which significantly reduces complexity but fails to meet core requirements.
risk_factors: RISK-002 (Data loss from sync bugs). RISK-006 (Stale service worker cache). Race conditions during rapid network toggling.
mitigation_strategy: Develop comprehensive E2E tests for various offline scenarios. Implement robust client-side logging. Use a library like Workbox for service worker management.

task_name: Terraform DB: Implement Multi-AZ Encrypted RDS Instance
resource_notes: Critical infrastructure component requiring expertise in AWS networking, IAM, and database security best practices.
alternative_approach: Use a single-AZ instance for dev/staging to reduce costs, but production must be Multi-AZ as per requirements.
risk_factors: RISK-004 (Terraform misconfiguration). Incorrectly configured security groups could expose the database.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory peer reviews for all Terraform code. Integrate IaC scanning tools into the CI/CD pipeline.
